title: Bug 116744: Dynamic text content type has no effect
OB: The dynamic text element is not displaying the contents of the field correctly.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Create a db field with three types of content: 
   a) HTML text within <html>...</html> tag. 
   b) HTML fragments not within <html> tag. 
   c) Text with RTF tags. 
2. Use a dynamic text element to display the contents of this field.
